chat.settings.footer.reset_dialog.descri: Είστε σίγουροι ότι θέλετε να reset all settings to their default values? This will reset all parameters to the values provided by the διακομιστής's /props endpoint and remove all your custom configurations.
chat.settings.import_export.export.title: Export Συνομιλίες
chat.settings.import_export.export.descr: Λήψη all your conversations as a JSON file. This includes all messages, attachments, and conversation history.
chat.settings.import_export.import.title: Import Συνομιλίες
chat.settings.import_export.import.descr: Import one or more conversations from a previously exported JSON file. This will merge with your existing conversations.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.title: Delete All Συνομιλίες
chat.settings.import_export.delete.descr: Permanently delete all conversations and their messages. Αυτή η ενέργεια δεν μπορεί να αναιρεθεί. Consider exporting your conversations first if you want to keep a backup.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.dialo: Είστε σίγουροι ότι θέλετε να delete all conversations? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all your conversations and messages.
chat.settings.import_export.import.inval: Invalid file format: expected array of conversations or single conversation object
chat.settings.import_export.import.faile: Failed to import conversations. Please check the file format.
